titleStmt.title: Dissertatio, quæ complectitur nova experimenta utilesque observationes circa aquam marinam secundem eorum artem, quibus regium diploma concessum est, dulcoratam serenissimo principi Carlo II ... / offerebat Nehemias Grew ...
titleStmt.author: Grew, Nehemiah, 1641-1712.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
